title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 07 January 2015 - XWiki
content:

14:38 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
14:46 <lucaa> has quit  
15:00 <evalica> Release 6.4-M3 complete http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleasePlans/ReleasePlan64M3  
15:04 <momomomomo> has quit  
15:13 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
15:18 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
15:28 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
15:35 <msmeria> has quit  
15:44 <gdelhumeau> Enygma`: are you ok with my proposal on XWIKI-11563?  
15:44 <gdelhumeau> see: http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/attachment/30109/proposal.png  
15:47 <Enygma`> gdelhumeau: actually I think we might need a wikis category  
15:47 <gdelhumeau> were we would put both?  
15:47 <Enygma`> since there are 3 configurable things right now: the current wiki's settings, wiki right settings and template settings  
15:47 <Enygma`> the "Wikis" section should be split in 2 because it does not make much sense right now  
15:48 <gdelhumeau> ah ok  
15:48 <gdelhumeau> let's do that  
15:48 <Enygma`> so we would end up with a category, like Email is, but with stuff related to wikis/multiwikis  
16:08 <gdelhumeau> Enygma`: http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/attachment/30110/Proposal2.png ?  
16:08 <gdelhumeau> I'm not fond of "Current Wiki" but I don't know what else I can put  
16:09 <Enygma`> How about just "Rights", "Descriptor" and "Templates"?  
16:10 <gdelhumeau> good  
16:10 <Enygma`> and maybe try to put Descriptor on the first position (probably through ConfigurableClass object order)  
16:10 <Enygma`> if possible  
16:14 <gdelhumeau> there is no order on ConfigurableClass  
16:14 <gdelhumeau> but can be added  
16:14 <tmortagne>   p, li { white-space: pre-wrap; }  [WARN] restarting xwiki.org  
16:47 <Lyes> has quit  
16:48 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
16:51 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: your blog is down: http://vmassol.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome  
16:51 <vmassol> thanks gdelhumeau, checking now  
16:52 <vmassol> if it's down then it's likely myxwiki.org is down too  
16:52 <gdelhumeau> oh sorry  
16:52 <vmassol> mm it's not down, just an descriptor issue I think  
16:52 <gdelhumeau> is it massol.myxwiki.org your url ?  
16:52 <vmassol> strange  
16:53 <gdelhumeau> I belived it was vmassol instead of massol  
16:53 <vmassol> ah yes it's massol not vmassol ;)  
16:53 <gdelhumeau> massol.myxwiki.org does answer, with distribution wizard actually  
16:53 <vmassol> yes, I'll run it  
16:53 <vmassol> you see it because you're farm admin  
16:53 <gdelhumeau> yes  
16:53 <gdelhumeau> sorry for the false alert then  
16:54 <vmassol> np thanks for raising it  
16:55 <vmassol> nice new blog gdelhumeau btw :)  
16:55 <vmassol> I like the L&F  
16:55 <gdelhumeau> thanks vmassol  
16:55 <vmassol> it really looks like a blog

18:22 <oldXwiki> hello  
18:24 <oldXwiki> Just testing my xwiki 3.5 install on Ubuntu 14.04.1 LTS /w tomcat7 and openjdk7 and I noticed something strange..  the dynamically resized images (?width=xyz) are the wrong color.. kind of a pinky version of the original..  
18:24 <oldXwiki> It was running on regular jdk7 on windows previously..  
18:25 <cjd> has quit  
18:32 <oldXwiki> Humm.. might be due to this java bug: https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8062164
